page.title: 01Parish Review - Whitehills
page.content: The block covers the seaward and most populous part of the parish of {BOYNDIE}with a population of 1400, mostly in the fishing village of {WHITEHILLS.}Main sources of employment are{FISHING, FARMING }and the {SERVICE {INDUSTRIES, }especially{Ladysbridge {Mental Hospital}( just outside the block) and{Local Government Employment at Banff, plus seasonal {TOURISM. From the cliffs to the West, the rocky foreshore with outlying reefs gives way to the magnificent sandy beach at {BANFF LINKS }starting at Boyndie Burn{(free fishing}for brown trout and occasional sea trout up to 3 lbs.) Also at the Boyndie Burn is a fully {serviced corporation caravan site}with warden,shop, and stances for 100 static and 33 touring vans.
